parameters.name: handleErrors
parameters.label: Evaluate all states as errors (except for 2xx and 3xx )

expect.name: shareCookies
expect.label: Share cookies with other HTTP modules

expect.name: rejectUnauthorized
expect.label: Reject connections that are using unverified (self-signed) certificates

expect.name: useQuerystring
expect.label: Disable serialization of multiple same query string keys as arrays

mapper.html:
Dear {{13.firstname}} {{13.lastname}},

Please find your offer in the attachement.

Accept offer

Reject offer

mapper.html:
Dear {{16.firstname}} {{16.lastname}},

After checking your health status we have to reject your application.

Yours sincerely,
Insurance Vitae
mapper.subject: Rejection Insruance Vitae

mapper.html:
Dear {{18.firstname}} {{18.lastname}},

Your application will be checked within 48h. If you don't get an answer, please contact us per phone or mail. To identify your request please provide us the following ID:
{{11.key}}


Yours sincerely,
Insurance Vitae
mapper.subject: Application check Insurance Vitae

mapper.html:
Dear {{32.firstname}} {{32.lastname}},

Please find the contract in the attachement.
If you agree the contract, please sign it digital and send it back to the following E-Mail-Adress:

insurance.vitae@gmail.com

Yours sincerely,
Insurance Vitae
mapper.subject: Contract Insurance Vitae

mapper.html:
Dear {{32.firstname}} {{32.lastname}},

Unfortunately we couldn't meet you expectations for a suplementary insurance of Insurance Vitae. If you you have further questions or need a personal consultation, let us know and we will arrange a personall call as soon as possible

Yours sincerely,
Insurance Vitae
mapper.subject: Rejection Offer
